name: defog
caption: Defog

effect.short: Lowers the target's evasion by one stage.  Removes field effects from the enemy field.
effect.full:
Lowers the target's [evasion]{mechanic:evasion} by one [stage]{mechanic:stage}.  Clears away fog.  Removes the effects of []{move:mist}, []{move:light-screen}, []{move:reflect}, []{move:safeguard}, []{move:spikes}, []{move:stealth-rock}, and []{move:toxic-spikes} from the target's side of the [field]{mechanic:field}.

If the target is protected by []{move:mist}, it will prevent the [evasion]{mechanic:evasion} change, then be removed by this move.

flavorText:
A strong wind blows away the target’s barriers such
as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the
target’s evasiveness.
